PHRASE.LANG: Now this is cool. It's a genuine Monkey Island voodoo mask. As a wise man once said, "You seem to have a rugged Nordic quality to you!" That means you should cover up with this voodoo mask.[#Legal]

Alors ça c'est la classe : un authentique masque vaudou de Monkey Island. Comme l'a dit un jour un grand sage : "Tu as un petit côté nordique sauvage ! " Ça veut dire qu'il vaut mieux te planquer derrière ce masque.[#Legal]

Also, das ist cool. Es ist eine echte Monkey Island-Voodoo-Maske. Wie ein weiser Mann einmal sagte, "Du hast eine raue nordische Seite an dir!" D.h., du solltest dich hinter dieser Voodoo-Maske verbergen.[#Legal]

Ora, questa è forte. È un'autentica maschera vudù di Monkey Island. Come disse un saggio: "Sembri avere un qualcosa di ruvidamente nordico!" Significa che dovresti coprirti con questa maschera vudù.[#Legal]
Esto sí que mola. Es la verdadera máscara de vudú de Monkey Island. Como una vez dijo un sabio: "¡Pareces un rudo nórdico!" Con esta máscara debes ir sobrado.[#Legal]
Now this is cool. It's a genuine Monkey Island voodoo mask. As a wise man once said, "You seem to have a rugged Nordic quality to you!" That means you should cover up with this voodoo mask. [#Legal]
Now this is cool. It's a genuine Monkey Island voodoo mask. As a wise man once said, "You seem to have a rugged Nordic quality to you!" That means you should cover up with this voodoo mask. [#Legal]
